nodes.text: Interstel Systems was a communications network and message service that operated in the Outer Rim Territories, near the edge of the Unknown Regions. They had a comm triad on Batuu, Mokivj and Plood, and an office in Yovbridge. Duja and Padmé Amidala both attempted to send messages via Interstel Systems, but the comm triad ceased to work. Amidala believed that someone had sabotaged the triad after noticing Duja's messages.
